Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: We need to analyze the problem We are given an initial DECLARE model example and we must add new constraints to limit the processs bias The process is a loan application review Sensitive attributes ApplicantAge ApplicantGender ApplicantRace First we need to interpret the existing model to see what activities are present The example model includes existence StartApplication FinalDecision init StartApplication coexistence StartApplication FinalDecision response StartApplication RequestAdditionalInfo succession RequestAdditionalInfo FinalDecision

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: We need to recall DECLARE constraint definitions response A B if A occurs then B must occur somewhere after A precedence A B if B occurs then A must have occurred before succession A B both response and precedence chainresponse A B if A occurs then B occurs immediately after chainprecedence A B if B occurs then A occurs immediately before nonchainsuccession A B A and B cannot occur consecutively nonsuccession B cannot directly follow A

Name: Abductive Reasoning - IND
Text: Identify potential bias a FinalDecision of Reject might occur more frequently after seeing attributes like ApplicantRace Minority without a proper check in between We need to add constraints that ensure fairness such as coexistence if decision for sensitive applicant ensure ManualReview response ensure decision steps cannot immediately follow sensitive attribute events without BiasMitigationCheck non succession prevent direct succession from sensitive attribute to decision

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Add new activities CheckApplicantRace CheckApplicantAge CheckApplicantGender ManualReview Add nonsuccession CheckApplicantRace FinalDecision etc response CheckApplicantRace ManualReview etc precedence ManualReview FinalDecision These ensure if sensitive check occurs then ManualReview after it and ManualReview before FinalDecision preventing direct bias

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Check compatibility with existing succession RequestAdditionalInfo FinalDecision both must precede FinalDecision fine no conflict response CheckApplicantRace ManualReview ensures after check precedence ensures before decision nonsuccession prevents immediate Combined if Disclosure occurs ManualReview must occur after it and before FinalDecision

Name: Backtracking - IND
Text: Consider requiring ManualReview only if sensitive attribute checked vs always precedence ManualReview FinalDecision forces always which is strong but safe conditional hard in DECLARE because no conditional constraints so accept universal manual review as fairness measure

Name: Counterfactual Reasoning - NE
Text: What if no CheckApplicantRace ManualReview still required by precedence what if ManualReview before check response requires one after check could have multiple fine but adds complexity consider separate decision activities like Approve Minority but too much change stick with current

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Propose specific additions to dictionary response add CheckApplicantX ManualReview precedence ManualReview FinalDecision nonsuccession CheckApplicantX FinalDecision construct full dict combine with original entries rationale prevent immediate decisions require review after sensitive check and before decision

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Verify with sample trace StartApplication RequestAdditionalInfo CheckApplicantRace ManualReview FinalDecision satisfies all existence response precedence nonsuccession succession no contradictions constraints coherent
